author: Ben Goodman
comment: Need to tweak the color scheme with how the clock is displayed. It's a little difficult to read against the background on most images. Tweak and I'll gladly re-rate, because otherwise it's great.
title: Almost great

author: R. Whitby Jarvis
comment: Wow!  These are the watch faces I've been looking for.  Great, great faces.  I have an LG Urbane.  Took a couple of tries to mount it.  10 truly wonderful faces for .99c.

author: George Kidd
comment: Doesn't work,sort it out I paid for this crap.
